tags.description: Core information related to your account
tags.name: account

tags.description: (BETA) Send, schedule and manage voice messages
tags.name: voice

get.description: Returns your account's credit balance

Returns data from the statistics report. Note that by default the statistics shown are based on the number of messages, use the calculateCreditValue should you wish to calculate the statistics based on credit value.

parameters.description: optional email address of user to return statistics for a single user, default is to return statistics for all users if administrator, or statistics for your own account if not an administrator
parameters.name: userEmailAddress

parameters.description: optionally include refunded and optout counts, default is false
parameters.name: includeRefundedAndOptout

parameters.description: optionally calculate using credit value rather than message count, default is false
parameters.name: calculateCreditValue

post.description: Transfers credits between two users in the same team. The account email address fields as well as the number of credits to transfer are required.

get.description: Find a user for a particular email address

put.description: Creates a new sub-account in your team. The following fields are required firstname, lastname, email address, contact number and password.

get.description: Gets a user from a given user id

post.description: Updates a sub-account in your team. The following fields can be updated firstname, lastname, contact number and password.

get.description: Returns all contacts

post.description: Updates a  contact

post.description: Remove a contact from a group

get.description: Returns all messages

parameters.description: number of elements to return at a time
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: phone number the message was sent from
parameters.name: fromNumber

parameters.description: phone number the message was sent to
parameters.name: toNumber

parameters.description: return only deleted / not deleted messages
parameters.name: deleted

parameters.description: return only read / unread messages (inbox messages only)
parameters.name: read

parameters.description: return only inbox messages which are a reply to the message with the given message id
parameters.name: repliesToMessageId

post.description: Returns full analysis of message
Returns the number of credit which would be required to send the request message to the requested recipient number
Returns the message encoding that would be required to send the requested message
Returns the number of characters the requested message consists of
Returns details for a single message
Returns the number of SMS parts which would be sent when sending the requested message

get.description: Returns details for a single message

post.description: Marks a  message as read
Marks a  message as unread

get.description: Returns an example of the data to POST to send a single message.

post.description: Sends a single message. The recipientNumber and message fields are required. All other fields are optional.

400.description:
Validation error

Code and message:
  • 2 - Invalid mobile number
  • 3 - Message cannot be empty

get.description: Returns an example of the data to POST to send multiple messages in one transaction.

post.description: Send multiple messages in one transaction.

get.description: Send a single message using URL parameters.The recipientNumber and message parameters are required. All other parameters are optional.

parameters.description: the phone number of the recipient to send to
parameters.name: recipientNumber

post.description: Send a single message using URL parameters.The recipientNumber and message parameters are required. All other parameters are optional.

parameters.description: the phone number of the recipient to send to
parameters.name: recipientNumber

get.description: Send a single message using your unique URL without having to authenticate using your email address or REST API token. The token required is the URL Sending token available on the developer setting page. The recipientNumber and message parameters are required. All other parameters are optional. Not that the token required here is

parameters.description: the phone number of the recipient to send to
parameters.name: recipientNumber

post.description: Send a single message using your unique URL without having to authenticate using your email address or REST API token. The token required is the URL Sending token available on the developer setting page. The recipientNumber and message parameters are required. All other parameters are optional. Not that the token required here is

parameters.description: the phone number of the recipient to send to
parameters.name: recipientNumber

post.description: Send a single audio voice message to one recipient. Note, Content-Type header must be set to multipart/form-data for this request.

parameters.description: audio file to play, supports MP3 or WAV format
parameters.name: file

parameters.description: the phone number of the recipient to send to
parameters.name: recipientNumber

parameters.description: optional number of times to retry unanswered call
parameters.name: retryCount

parameters.description: optional minimum interval in minutes between retry attempts
parameters.name: retryMinimumInterval

parameters.description: optional maximum interval in minutes between retry attempts
parameters.name: retryMaximumInterval

post.description: Send a single text voice message to one recipient
